SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.EmployeeID , AA.DepartmentID , AA.MainYn , AA.Position , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, BB.DepartmentName , EE.EmployeeName
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BCAppointment AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BCDepartment BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.DepartmentID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BCEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.EmployeeID = EE.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# )
AND ( AA.EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.EmployeeID , AA.DepartmentID , AA.MainYn , AA.Position , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BCAppointment AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BCAppointment ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, EmployeeID, DepartmentID, MainYn, Position, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #EmployeeID#, #DepartmentID#, #MainYn#, #Position#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BCAppointment SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# , DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# , MainYn = #MainYn# , Position = #Position# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.EmployeeID , AA.DepartmentID , AA.MainYn , AA.Position , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BCAppointment AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# AND AA.StartDate = #StartDate#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.EmployeeID , AA.DepartmentID , AA.MainYn , AA.Position , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BCAppointment AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT Max(StartDate) FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BCAppointment WHERE EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.EmployeeID , AA.DepartmentID , AA.MainYn , AA.Position , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BCAppointment AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT Min(StartDate) FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BCAppointment WHERE EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# AND StartDate > #StartDate# )
